long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kaxaa Wallet is chrome extension to access KAXAA wallet functionality in chrome web browser. It helps KAXAA wallet users to keep track of their KAX coins with out needing to keep KAXAA wallet app open. Users can see their coins, they can link their KAXAA wallet to other DEX (distributed exchanges), CEX (centralized exchanges), and dApps (Distribute Apps) using WalletConnect (WC) integration. Users can receive different WC notifications within their browser extension and perform actions quickly. User's can also copy paste their Wallet addresses, and see their KAX coin balance in real time.
